clues.text: Memorial Auditorium is the home arena of the Buffalo Sabres, a pro team in this sport
A stone obelisk in downtown Buffalo honors this president who was slain in the city in 1901
The city lies at the head of the Niagara River at the eastern end of this Great Lake
Marcus Junius & Decimus Junius were "Et 2" people with this name in the plot to kill Caesar
This J-shaped organ is usually located in the upper left side of the abdominal cavity
The title foundling turns out to be Squire Allworthy's nephew in this Fielding work
Jesus is the title character in this Nikos Kazantzakis novel
He is shocked to learn that the convict Magwitch is the source of his "Great Expectations"
The title of this Theodore Dreiser novel is the family nickname for Caroline Meeber
Julien Sorel, the main character of this "colorful" Stendahl novel, is also its villain
A week after his election, this president offered Lewis a post as his private secretary
As a member of the militia, Lewis went to Pennsylvania in 1794 to suppress this rebellion
This man, one of William Clark's brothers, captured Vincennes during the Revolution

rounds.text: The 2 states formed from counties of the state of Virginia
